casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffrey Lee CATES. No. 355P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, Joel H. Brewer, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of July 2005 by Defendant to Proceed in Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of August 2005."
